channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Goals as a chief resident
item.description: Tomorrow Tomorrow is my first day as the chief pediatric resident at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center in NYC. I have lots of goals for the year, but knowing how chaotic life is in the hospital, I wanted to make sure I wrote them down before they are forgotten! I often find the workflow in hospitals is so busy that it is often to just hard enough to survive the day without building the foundation to try to have more good days.

item.title: The first post of the new website
item.description: This is my first post on my new website built with the R package blogdown, the help of many online help pages, and my lovely husband. I am using Github and Netlify as well. I donâ€™t have the energy to write a post about how I built this, but here is the list of things that caused pain: in my config.toml file I had replaced the baseurl default of baseurl = "

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Mara Alexeev. I currently live in New York City, but I grew up on a farm in central Iowa. In fourth grade I was in love with space and wanted to be a part time astronaut and part time farmer. While those dreams have not yet been realized, I have completed a combined pediatrics residency and masters of public health at Oakland Kaiser Permanente and at UC Berkeley in May 2016, respectively.
